1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Elements of data resource.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Element
7  ( resourceElem
8  ) where
9
10import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture  as O
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base      as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax    as S
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data      as D
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core      as C
15
16infixr 0 //
17(//) :: n -> c -> (n, c)
18(//) n c = (n, c)
19
20-- | Retrive elements of data resource.
21--   This function may output judges of the following classes.
22--
23--   [@KOSHU-AFFIRM@]
24--     There is affirmed relmap for class @\/pat@
25--     in the resource @\/res@.
26--
27--   [@KOSHU-DENY@]
28--     There is denied relmap for class @\/pat@
29--     in the resource @\/res@.
30--
31--   [@KOSHU-JUDGE-TERM@]
32--     In the resource @\/res@,
33--     there are judges of class @\/pat@
34--     with term named @\/name@ having @\/content@.
35--
36--   [@KOSHU-RELMAP-NAME@]
37--     There is a relmap named @\/name@ in the resource @\/res@.
38--
39--   [@KOSHU-RELMAP-REF@]
40--     Relmap @\/name@ in the resource @\/res@
41--     refers the other relmap @\/ref@.
42--
43--   [@KOSHU-RELMAP-ROP@]
44--     Relmap @\/name@ in the resource @\/res@
45--     uses the relmap operator @\/rop@.
46--
47--   [@KOSHU-RELMAP-SOURCE@]
48--     Judges of class @\/pat@ with terms @\/terms@
49--     are read from the resource @\/res@.
50--
51resourceElem :: (D.CContent c) => C.Resource c -> [D.Judge c]
52resourceElem res = map art js where
53    art  = D.judgeAdd ("point" // path)
54    path = D.pText $ B.ioPointText $ B.nioPoint $ head $ C.resIncluded res
55    ass  = map S.shortBody $ C.resAssert res
56    js   = concat [ elemJudge       $ C.resJudge res
57                  , elemAssert      $ ass
58                  , elemNamedRelmap $ concatMap C.assLinks ass ]
59
60elemJudge :: (D.CContent c) => O.Map [D.Judge c]
61elemJudge = B.unique . concatMap f where
62    f j = map (term $ D.getClass j) (D.getTerms j)
63    term p (n, c) = D.affirm "KOSHU-JUDGE-TERM"
64                    [ "pat"     // D.pText p
65                    , "name"    // D.pText $ S.termNameContent n
66                    , "content" // c ]
67
68elemAssert :: (D.CContent c) => [C.Assert c] -> [D.Judge c]
69elemAssert = B.unique . concatMap f where
70    f (C.Assert _ _ _ _ _ Nothing _) = B.bug "elemAssert"
71    f (C.Assert _ t pat _ _ (Just r) _) =
72        let p     = "name" // D.pText pat
73            ass   = D.affirm (quality t) [p]
74            rmaps = D.judgeAdd p `map` elemRelmap r
75        in ass : rmaps
76
77    quality D.AssertAffirm       = "KOSHU-AFFIRM"
78    quality D.AssertDeny         = "KOSHU-DENY"
79    quality D.AssertMultiDeny    = "KOSHU-MULTI-DENY"
80    quality D.AssertChange       = "KOSHU-CHANGE"
81    quality D.AssertMultiChange  = "KOSHU-MULTI-CHANGE"
82    quality D.AssertViolate      = "KOSHU-VIOLATE"
83
84elemNamedRelmap :: (D.CContent c) => C.RelmapLinkTable c -> [D.Judge c]
85elemNamedRelmap = B.unique . concatMap f where
86    f (lx, relmap) = D.judgeAdd ("name" // D.pText $ C.lexName lx)
87                        `map` elemRelmap relmap
88
89elemRelmap :: (D.CContent c) => C.Relmap c -> [D.Judge c]
90elemRelmap relmap = name : f relmap where
91    name          = D.affirm "KOSHU-RELMAP-NAME" []
92    op lx         = let p = opType lx
93                        n = C.lexName lx
94                    in D.affirm p [ "rop" // D.pText n ]
95    opType lx     = case C.lexType lx of
96                      C.LexmapBase    -> "KOSHU-RELMAP-BASE"
97                      C.LexmapDerived -> "KOSHU-RELMAP-DERIV"
98                      C.LexmapLocal   -> "KOSHU-RELMAP-LOCAL"
99    src p xs      = D.affirm "KOSHU-RELMAP-SOURCE"
100                      [ "pat"   // D.pText p
101                      , "terms" // D.pTermSet xs ]
102
103    f (C.RelmapAppend r1 r2)     = f r1 ++ f r2
104    f (C.RelmapCalc   lx _ rs)   = op lx : concatMap f rs
105    f (C.RelmapCopy   lx _ r1)   = op lx : f r1
106    f (C.RelmapNest   lx r1)     = op lx : f r1
107    f (C.RelmapSource lx p xs)   = [op lx, src p xs]
108    f (C.RelmapLink   lx)        = [op lx]
109    f (C.RelmapHook   lx _)      = [op lx]
110    f (C.RelmapConst  lx _)      = [op lx]
111
